<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

</MethodEndpoint>



Invoke a specific tool on an agent.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"agent_id","required":true,"schema":{"title":"Agent Id","type":"string"}},{"in":"path","name":"tool_name","required":true,"schema":{"title":"Tool Name","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Request to invoke a specific agent tool.","properties":{"parameters":{"additionalProperties":true,"title":"Parameters","type":"object"},"tool_name":{"title":"Tool Name","type":"string"}},"required":["tool_name","parameters"],"title":"AgentToolRequest","type":"object"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Response from tool invocation.","properties":{"agent":{"title":"Agent","type":"string"},"error":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Error"},"result":{"title":"Result"},"success":{"title":"Success","type":"boolean"},"tool":{"title":"Tool","type":"string"}},"required":["agent","tool","result","success"],"title":"AgentToolResponse","type":"object"}}},"description":"Successful Response"},"422":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"detail":{"items":{"properties":{"loc":{"items":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"integer"}]},"title":"Location","type":"array"},"msg":{"title":"Message","type":"string"},"type":{"title":"Error Type","type":"string"}},"required":["loc","msg","type"],"title":"ValidationError","type":"object"},"title":"Detail","type":"array"}},"title":"HTTPValidationError","type":"object"}}},"description":"Validation Error"}}}
